page.title: 06Opinions about Oakham
page.content:
I think Oakham is good because it has a big park and two churches and one church hall. I live down the road from a church, it is our school's church. (by Josh Findlay, 8 yrs old)
I like living in Oakham because we have got a big house and two cars and a big garden. We have quite a big porch. (Simon Dooley, 8 yrs old)
I think Oakham is good because there are lots of big shops like NNS which is a newspagents. It is a brand new shop and it opened this year. (James Foreman, 7 yrs old)
